keywords: ['pop', 'sustained strings melody', 'flat male vocal', 'punchy snare', 'wide harmonizing background vocals', 'punchy kick', 'shimmering hi hats', 'energetic crash cymbal', 'groovy piano chords', 'wide acoustic guitar melody', 'uplifting', 'groovy bass guitar', 'smooth', 'addictive']
caption: The Pop song features a flat male vocal, alongside wide harmonizing background vocals, singing over punchy kick and snare hits, shimmering hi hats, energetic crash cymbals, groovy piano chords and widely spread acoustic guitar melody. It sounds smooth, uplifting and addictive thanks to those harmonizing vocals.
